live_updates: The issue has been resolved. Thanks for your patience

30207.summary: Some customers in Western area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30207.title: Dec 8 – Thunder Bay (West)| All Services - Outage (Resolved)
